text:
Hi guys! Hope you're well. So me and
Gennaro are here at the Jamie's Italian test

kitchen. We're gonna do a special of the
day, but it's not gonna be for a day, it's gonna

be for a whole week. From today, Monday
all the way through to Sunday we are

going to celebrate some amazing British
produce. First up, langoustines from

Scotland. Unbelievable! If you like
prawns these are the Aston Martin. They're

so sweet and so delicious,
and we want to balance it with some

other amazing British produce. We're
going to do it with some foraged wild

garlic, which is so subtle and so
delicious. We're going to complete that

with asparagus, just cut up. Some cherry
tomatoes, red and yellow, and we're going

to combine it with some chillies and
capers and a little white wine. Every

single day in Jamie's Italian we make all
of our pastas, whether it's tagliatelle,

casarecce, pappardelle.
We're going to go in with the

langoustine, that's been nicely peeled. We're
not going to chop this, okay, we're gonna

go in with our wild garlic. I quite like
the natural shape going on, which is

really really beautiful, and then we're
going to go in with the asparagus,

the tomatoes, the chilli and the capers. So a
little half ladle of this special

passata that we use which is made out of
all the kind of prawn heads. A really

nice fish bisque, delicious. That's a
nice light pasta. How about,

controversially, a little tiny bit of
Parmesan. Tiny!  Ahhhh? No but how about this,

in Venice
I've seen them seasoning a pasta like

this with a tiny bit of parmesan. What is
it? What is it with you Italians that

always disagree about things? You know
what let's put a bit of parmesan, let's

have a taste of it. And let's just plate
this up. This is gonna be a special that

runs Monday to Sunday in every Jamie's
Italian across the UK. So that lovely

sort of deep flavour from the tomato
bisque sauce. You've got the sweetness

of the tomatoes. The asparagus is so
delicate and I think it really works well.

So look at that! What a beautiful
pasta! What a special! Celebrating loads

of beautiful British produce - Scottish
langoustines, British asparagus, we've got

that beautiful sweet tomato sauce,
wild garlic. Yes!
Come on! Come and see us at Jamie's Italian. This will be on in every single restaurant across
the UK. You're gonna love it! Enjoy! Yes!
